name: Shoppy Mart (itch)
description:
You've just been hired as the newest checker at your local Shoppy Mart. Timeline: May 11th, 2015 - 1.0 Released May 14th, 2015 - 1.0.0.1 Released June 15th, 2015 - 1.1 Released October 13th, 2015 - 1.2 Released

October 18th, 2016: Shoppy Mart: Mobile Edition 1.1.9 Released (BETA)

1.2 Update: Updated Graphics!

The graphics have been completely reworked! The game is also now in 60fps.


Customer Unlocks!

You can now unlock customers as you level up at the end of the day.

Cheat Codes!

Can you find them all? Mwuhahahaha

Lots more! CONTROLS:
  • LEFT CLICK drags items/interacts
  • HOLD SHIFT shows the produce codes
  • 1-9/KEYPAD inserts produce codes
  • ENTER confirms the produce code
  • BACKSPACE works if you mess up a produce code
CREDITS: A game by @Pezomi Art: @ZachLegat Music: @CadeLegat
